title: Ticket #7165: ToE tags break condor_submit -i
description: condor_submit -i now exits immediately after the ToE tag merge.
remarks:
2019-Jul-25 14:06:05 by tlmiller:
Isolated the problem to 

Starter->publishUpdateAd( & updateAd );

in OsProc::JobReaper(), which makes no sense. Investigation continues.

2019-Jul-25 16:42:44 by tlmiller:
publishUpdateAd() walks the proc list that the base starter's reaper is walking to determine if any of its procs know about the process that just died.

I elected to remove the land-mine rather than code carefully around it, but the code is ugly because (our) List<> doesn't allow for assignment or copy-construction. Since List<> doesn't appear to own the pointers it carries around, I don't understand why this was done, so I may ask for a code review.

Testing in run ID 476405.

2019-Jul-26 11:04:37 by tlmiller:
Cherry-picked off the V8_9-gt7165-branch into V8_9_3, from whence it should be merged to master.
